q1.question: Does this have legal value?
q1.answer: Yes. A blockchain timestamp constitutes proof of priority admissible in French and European courts. Our certificate includes all elements necessary to present to a lawyer or judge.

q2.question: Is my file stored on the blockchain?
q2.answer: No. Only the cryptographic fingerprint (hash) of your file is recorded on-chain. Your work remains private, stored on our secure servers or yours.

q3.question: What's the difference with SACEM or INPI filing?
q3.answer: UnlmtdProof is complementary. SACEM manages your exploitation rights, INPI protects specific creations with a lengthy procedure. UnlmtdProof gives you instant proof of priority, for all file types, at a fraction of the cost.

q4.question: Does it work for AI-generated creations?
q4.answer: Absolutely. It's even one of our main use cases. You can document your prompts, the AI/human percentage, and create complete traceability of your creative process.

q5.question: Do my credits expire?
q5.answer: No. Your credits are valid for life. Use them whenever you want.
